WorkItem.Description:
The item list appears to be restricted to just the item equipped for a Rogue.
Example:
1.) Start a new character
2.) Select a helm (any helm)
3.) Edit base stats and set Class / Model to Rogue.
You will immediately see the comparison list restricted to only the helm selected.
4.) Edit base stats and select any other Class / Model
The list will open up and show all other comparative item
 
This appears in both the web and offline version and for any gear slot.
 
Note:  This did not appear to be an issue in the prior release
WorkItem.Summary: [Rogue] No items visible other than worn

Comments.Message: The Rogue Item Relevancy functions are messed up somewhere.
It works with my test chars but not with a new one indeed, I'm going to find out what goes wrong.

The problem is that there are no gemming templates selected by default.
A manual fix for now: go to options -> edit gemming templates and select uncommon or rare.
